abstract: Calpers, the California public pension fund, is seeking opportunities to buy assets of Citigroup and others tied to the government’s $700 billion Troubled Asset Relief Program, Bloomberg News reported.
lead_paragraph: Calpers, the California public pension fund, is seeking opportunities to buy assets of Citigroup and others tied to the government’s $700 billion Troubled Asset Relief Program, Bloomberg News reported.

headline.main: Calpers Eyes Citigroup’s TARP Assets, Report Says
